metadata.name: Enlightenment
metadata.description:
Artist - Keri Little  
Location - Auckland, New Zealand  
These pieces were a collaboration with my 14 year old daughter during lockdown. My daughter is an incredibly creative empath, during lockdown we recognised that we both needed to inject some creativity into each day. She did her face paint, I took the photos and we worked together to add the effects and music to produce these small mindful moments. Our intention is for you as the viewer to maintain focus on the eyes, whilst drawing a breath and balancing yourself with both the sound and movement.  

The word associated with this moment is ENLIGHTENMENT.
